document.full_text: mississippi is set to execute later on tuesday a man who raped and murdered a 79-year-old woman in 1994, the second of three inmates scheduled to be put to death in the state this month.
document.title: mississippi set to execute man for 1994 murder
lines_and_colors: mississippi is set to execute later on tuesday a man who raped and murdered a 79-year-old woman in 1994, the second of three inmates scheduled to be put to death in the state this month.
